articles.author: Greg Rosenstein
articles.title: How to watch the 2026 Rose Bowl: No. 1 Indiana faces No. 9 Alabama in College Football Playoffs - NBC News
articles.description: Learn more on how to watch the Rose Bowl, what time it starts and what to expect as the Indiana Hoosiers and Alabama Crimson Tide meet in the College Football Playoffs.
articles.content:
The 112th Rose Bowl, a College Football Playoff quarterfinal game, takes place New Years Day in Pasadena, California, featuring one of the most unusual matchups the sport can offer.
